Package plugins

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CompareImagesForDifferences
    This tool can be used to compare two images for statistically significant differences by performing either a paired-sample t-test or a two-sample Kolmogorov-Smirnov (K-S) test on the two images..
    CorrelationForAttributes
    This tool can be used to estimate the Pearson product-moment correlation coefficient (r) for each pair among a group of attributes associated with the database file of a shapefile.
    CrispnessIndex
    The Crispness Index (C) provides a means of quantifying the crispness, or fuzziness, of a membership probability (MP) image.
    CrossTabulation
    This tool can be used to perform a cross-tabulation on two input raster images containing categorical data such as classes.
    CumulativeDistributionFunction
    This tool converts the values in an input image into cumulative probabilities.
    ExtractStatistics
    This tool can be used to extract common descriptive statistics associated with the distribution of some underlying Data Raster Image based on area units defined by a Feature Definition Raster Image.
    FuzzyMembership
    This tool can be used to create fuzzy membership probability (MP) images.
    Histogram
    This tool can be used to generate histogram data (data about the statistical distribution) of the values in an image.
    HistogramMatching
    This tool alters the cumulative distribution function (CDF) of a raster image to match, as closely as possible, the CDF of a reference histogram.
    ImageAutocorrelation
    Spatial autocorrelation describes the extent to which a variable is either dispersed or clustered through space.
    ImageAverage
    This tool can be used to calculate the average value in a raster image.
    ImageCorrelation
    This tool can be used to estimate the Pearson product-moment correlation coefficient (r) between two images.
    ImageRegression
    This tool performs a bivariate linear regression analysis on two input raster images.
    ImageStandardDeviation
    This tool can be used to calculate the standard deviation value in a raster image.
    ImageTotal
    This tool can be used to calculate the total value in a raster image.
    KappaIndex
    This tool calculates the Kappa index of agreement (KIA) for two classified raster images.
    NumberOfGridCells
    This tool simply counts the number of valid grid cells in a raster grid.
    PCAForAttributes
    This tool can be used to perform a principal component analysis (PCA) on a group of specified attributes from a vector file.
    PCAForAttributes.PrincipalComponent  
    RandomField
    This tool can be used to a raster image filled with random values drawn from a normal distribution.
    RandomSample
    This tool can be used to create a random sample of grid cells.
    TestForNormality
    This tool will perform a Kolmogorov-Smirnov (K-S) test for normality to evaluate whether the frequency distribution of values within a raster image are drawn from a Gaussian (normal) distribution.
    TrendSurface
    This tool can be used to interpolate a trend surface from a raster image.
    TrendSurfaceVectorPoints
    This tool can be used to interpolate a trend surface from a vector points file.
    TurningBands
    This tool can be used to create a random field using the turning bands algorithm.
    TwoImageHistogramMatching
    This tool alters the cumulative distribution function (CDF) of a raster image to match, as closely as possible, the CDF of a reference image.
    ZScores
    This tool will transform the values in an input raster image into z-scores.
